sentences.sentence: They learn new roles and unlearn old ones.

sentences.sentence: You'll have to unlearn all the bad habits you learned with your last piano teacher.

sentences.sentence: Others want to unlearn behaviors that only add to their problems.
sentences.translation: 另一些人想忘掉只会增加他们问题的行为。
